titleInfo.title: Oval portrait of woman holding child.

mods.note: Perhaps Howard Lytle's wife, Lillie Dickenson, holding one of their infant children.

physicalDescription.note: Photograph : resin coated paper print from copy negative

titleInfo.title: Andrew D. Lytle's Baton Rouge' Photograph Collection/
